name: Zhaowei Tan
content: Zhaowei Tan's Homepage Zhaowei Tan Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering Department of ECE (Cooperating) Affiliated to CRESP, NSSL University of California, Riverside Office: Winston Chung Hall 326 Email: ztan at ucr dot edu Hello! I am a Tenure-Track Assistant Professor at UC Riverside, CSE Department. I am a cooperating faculty member at ECE department. My research interests are in the broad area of networking, systems, and cybersecurity, aiming to build performant, intelligent, secure, and resilient networked systems. My recent research specifically targets IoT, 5G, and next-generation wireless networked systems. Before joining UCR, I was a Postdoctoral Scholar at UCLA, working with Prof. Songwu Lu. I received my Ph.D. degree from the same research group in 2022. Prior to UCLA, I got my BS degree (with honor) in CS from Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU), under supervision of Prof. Xinbing Wang and Prof. Xiaofeng Gao. [Group] [Publications] [Teaching] [Service] [Software] [Grants] [Honors] What's New Oct. 2025TPC for MobiCom '26, MobiSys '26, INFOCOM '26, CoNEXT '26, and Open AI RAN '25 Mar. 2025Our research on firewall misconfigurations and their implication on the Internet has been accepted by S&P '25. Feb. 2025Invited to serve as Proceedings Co-Chair for CCS '25. Jan. 2025SEE-V2X and AGLINK have been funded by OASIS. Looking forward to pushing the boundary of Intelligent Transportation and Digital Agriculture! Jan. 2025One paper conditionally SEE-V2X accepted to Sensys '25. Dec. 2024One paper conditionally ARCANE accepted to MobiCom '25. Dec. 2024Invited to deliver a keynote speech for 5G-MeMU at CoNEXT '24. Nov. 2024Invited to serve on TPC for MobiSys '25. Please consider submitting! Sep. 2024Thank you NSF, for funding our project on 5G diagnostic testing. Sep. 2024Local Arrangement Chair for MobiSys '25 and HotMobile '25. Also served as Student Travel Grant Co-Chair for HotMobile '25. Aug. 2024Co-organizing Open-AI RAN Workshop at MobiCom '24. The workshop will cover exciting topics for next generation O-RAN. Please consider joining us at MobiCom this year. Research Group (GeNeLa) I'm fortunate to work with the following talented people. PhD Students Sixu Tan (Fall 23 - ) Zhutian Liu (Winter 24 - ) Kuangyu Chen (Co-Advise With Srikanth) (Fall 24 - ) Ruoshen Mo (Co-Advise With Hang) (Fall 24 - ) Ruide Cao (Co-Advise With Srikanth) (Fall 25 - ) More student information at GeNeLa. If you are interested in working with me, please read this note.
